text: Yahoo released its fourth quarter 2014 financial report and launched a tax-free plan to divest its 15% stake in Alibaba Group, with the intention of distributing this valuable investment worth approximately $40 billion to shareholders. As of the time of publication, Yahoo's stock price had risen by approximately 7% to $51.45.
claim: Alibaba has released financial reports and launched a plan to divest Yahoo's equity. Alibaba's stock price rose to $7.
label: CORRECT
